I didn't think this year's Stoneybatter Festival could beat last year's but: Sun! An appearance from Miggeldy! Someone baking an actual jumper into a cake in Mrs Doyle's bake off! What a day 😎 https://t.co/WmUoCE7PyS
Thanks @8RadioIreland for playing Lisa Hannigan's version of Send In The Clowns just there. https://t.co/QB6MhdjMR0

@msleedy @DublinOptica Ooh, they are lovely. Am in no way in need of a new pair but...
@meganhunting @intercom It's one of the things I'm missing most right now! Demo FOMO.
Sixteen weeks to the day since the height of Storm Emma 😎 https://t.co/Wn1Kt6L3Y6
@JoannaDonnellyL @drivetimerte Crazy to think we were in deepest blizzard conditions 16 weeks ago today (when my daughter was born!)
@kirstie Solid plan 👌
@kirstie End of August. Considered Airbnbing the gaff out for $$$$$ but not sure our heathen ways would appeal.
@kirstie Same. Getting the eff out of Dublin that weekend.
@TomFoxy This is worse than the Happy Pear.

Dear work: can you pls keep building more cool stuff like this when I get back from mat leave? Love, Slightly Dizzy in Dublin ❤ https://t.co/02WZPyulYG

@brian_scanlan Proper order!
@brian_scanlan I hope they supplied the beer!
@niamhconroy @EmerTheScreamer Honestly the only redeeming bit was Girl Band popping up on the soundtrack.
@EmerTheScreamer @niamhconroy And the previous week's was A Quiet Place. Shook!
@niamhconroy @EmerTheScreamer Saw it at parent and baby cinema when Hazel was 6 weeks old. HORRIFYING.
@SarahJayBee https://t.co/gHmJV7IjmR
@deirdren @PatrickFreyne1 Same here! Lucky to have our local branch a 5 min walk away. We've gotten to know the librarians too and they keep books aside they think A will like 😍
Zadie Smith's account of her local London library's fate is altogether more bleak: https://t.co/C66g1SEyUs
We're so lucky to have a well-funded library program here in comparison to the UK and US. This is a brilliant, moving piece from @PatrickFreyne1: https://t.co/VJP3XHccmK
@BrotherHubbardN Hooray! Open all weekend?
@niamhconroy You poor thing 😔 have you tried Active Iron? Easier to stomach appara (a friend swore by it for PPA but I didn't get a chance to try)

@niamhconroy Arrgh you poor thing. I'd a bad dose of it post partum - double galfer and a boat load of dietary iron plus rest sorted it. It's minus craic though, hope you can knock it on the head soon.
@davidlili Oh we're total suckers like that. First Brooklyn, then London, then here.
Feels appropriate to be cracking in to @maevehiggins and Actual Mary Robinson's brilliant new podcast on this insanely hot afternoon - https://t.co/223RHF5GYs https://t.co/CRawTPKvtB
@drrrop Lots of corporate batch orders propping up the business too but even that has a shelf life.
😳 https://t.co/bSFVxuDuoD

@redlemonader The heatwave seemed to go on for about a year, that might have something to do with it!

Drove past Repeal Island this afternoon and had a lil cheer to myself. Mad to think we were in the final anxious throes of canvassing only 3 months ago (especially as this week's papal hoo-ha makes it feel like we've travelled 50 years back in time).
